name: Ski Rodeo
summary:
"Will you be able to manage skiing off impossible cliffs? 
Ski down the sharp slopes of the vast snowy mountain with its sheer drops at tremendous speed!! 
Fight for control of the wild skis! 
The specialized sensory machine creates a shockingly real experience with the response of the skis and intense vibrations. 
There are several different routes that will take you to the goal. Aim to reach it as fast as you can."
